DOC.brief_title: Levonorgestrel Intrauterine System For Emergency Contraception
DOC.detailed_description: Unintended pregnancy rate United States among high develop nation . These high rate largely attribute incorrect contraception woman . One focus decrease unintended pregnancy abortion rate center expand access use long act reversible contraceptive ( LARC ) method include intrauterine device ( IUDs ) , subdermal implant . Emergency contraception ( EC ) , post-coital contraception , offer significant reduction chance pregnancy follow act unprotected under-protected vaginal intercourse . Oral emergency contraception commonly use United States oral Ulipristal acetate ( Ella ) regimen reduce pregnancy risk 89-95 % . More effective , rarely use , Cu T-380 intrauterine device . The intrauterine device add benefit providing extend contraceptive use beyond single episode unprotected intercourse . The Cu-T380 associate heavy crampy menses however , likely dissuade woman use . Among IUD user , levonorgestrel IUS gain popularity Cu-T380 , perhaps offer potential improve menstrual relate symptom . There data however efficacy levonorgestrel IUS form emergency contraception . The purpose study evaluate efficacy LNG-IUS ( levonorgestrel- intrauterine system ) method emergency contraception . Participants randomize receive either common method , oral levonorgestrel , LNG-IUS . Participants call 5-6 week follow method allocation result self-administered urine pregnancy test . Lastly , participant ask complete telephone survey 6 12 month follow method allocation assess use consistent contraceptive method , satisfaction contraceptive method , use emergency contraception since enrollment study , lastly unintended pregnancy experience since enrollment study . If could show levonorgestrel IUS ( intrauterine system ) effective commonly prescribe method emergency contraception , would introduce another opportunity LARC initiation subsequently impact unintended pregnancy abortion rate .
DOC.criteria: Women age 1845 Underprotected intercourse within last five day ( 120 hour ) Willingness accept either IUS intervention oral EC Ability willingness followup clinic urine pregnancy test ( UPT ) Ability willingness contact phone 6 12 month followup Positive pregnancy test NonEnglish speaking Contraindication intrauterine contraception oral EC Inability unwillingness comply followup
